caption.title: UL42 does not affect polyubiquitination of cGAS and MITA, related to Figs 5 and 6.
caption.p: HEK293 cells (1x10 6) were transfected with Flag-cGAS or Flag-MITA (2 μg each), HA-Ub or its mutants (1 μg each), and a control or UL42 expression plasmid (0.5 μg) for 20 hr, followed by co-immunoprecipitation and immunoblotting analysis with the indicated antibodies.
Click here for additional data file.
